Title: Keep a firm grip on literary power to consolidate the dictatorship of the proletariat
Designer: Worker-peasant-soldier Fine Art Creation and Study Class of the Shanghai Municipal Fine Arts University (上海市美术学校工农兵美术创作学习班)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The text on the blackboard reads "The question of lines must be discussed year after year, month after month, day after day".
